title: New: Laurel Halo – Sunlight On The Faded
body:
Following the release of her debut LP, ‘_Quarantine_’, on Hyperdub, **[Laurel Halo](https://www.facebook.com/laurelhalo)** returns this month with her new single ‘_Sunlight On The Faded_’, which was premiered on Belgium radio station **Scorpio** last Friday. It’s a choppy and manic affair, **Halo**’s lush harmonies snap and jar with her eloquently chaotic beats and wild synths. Amongst the whirlwind however is a real sense of romanticism, ‘only the best memories stay’, she repeats, same tone, same amount of conviction every time she says it. The repetition is enough, this one’s a keeper.

[Laurel Halo – Sunlight on the Faded — Sterrenplaten 30 November 2012](http://www.mixcloud.com/Sterrenplaten/laurel-halo-sunlight-on-the-faded-sterrenplaten-30-november-2012/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=resource_link) by [Sterrenplaten](http://www.mixcloud.com/Sterrenplaten/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
